dynmethods

Wrappers for trajectory inference methods

execute_method()

Run a method on a set of tasks with a set of parameters

execute_method_internal()

Internal method for executing a method

execute_method_on_task()

Run a method on a task with a set of parameters

get_default_parameters()

Get the default parameters of a method

get_descriptions()

Return all TI descriptions

infer_trajectory() infer_trajectories()

Infer a trajectory on one (or more) tasks, using one (or more) methods

install_dependencies()

Install dependencies for a method

is_description()

Tests whether an object is a TI method description

is_prediction()

Tests whether an object is a trajectory created by a TI method.
